Reviews.Content: located quiet safe neighbourhood hustle bustle zone 1 london tube station kilburn park overground station kilburn road 5 mins walk hotel various buses zone 1 london comfortable furnishing quality bit air con didnt warm temperature set addition tv wasnt lazy inform reception leaving day reasonable price zone 2 london hotel

Reviews.Content: booked quality maitrise online via lastminutecom price nights stayed £35 person night paid price hotel disappointed indeed stated peoples reviews warm air conditioning poor window awfully hot stay mid summer unbearable remote bed getting change channel tv kept switching plug socket close mirror hair straighteners staff unfriendly rude simply bothered plus shower amazing bed incredibly comfortable hotel clean tube 5 minute walk considered stay
